issue.title: [Python] Use np.full instead of np.array.repeat in ParquetDatasetPiece
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7367](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7367). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For small tables (len < 100) execution time is slightly degraded (~ x1.4 at len = 10), for large ones performance gain is huge (exec time ~ x0.04 at len = 100_000)
